definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Environmental characteristic of walleye pollock fishing ground in high seas of the okhotsk sea in summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏季鄂霍茨克海公海區狹鱈漁場環境特徵。

sentences.english: At present, the vessel is carrying out relevant activities on the high seas.
sentences.chinese: 目前該科學考察船正在公海海域開展相關活動。

sentences.english: Soon we had left the river estuary and were heading towards the open sea.
sentences.chinese: 不一會兒，我們離開了河口灣，向公海前進。

sentences.english: The male elephant seal fight over females for the rights to mate.
sentences.chinese: 公海象們爲了爭奪母海象的芳心及交配權而鬥。

sentences.english: Fish hooked on the high seas, however, belonged to whoever caught them.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在公海捕獲的魚，則歸捕撈者所有。

sentences.english: Some plunderers pirated the passengers' properties on the high seas.
sentences.chinese: 一些搶劫犯在公海以海盜方式掠奪旅客的財物。

sentences.english: It's the Wild West out in the open ocean.
Tens of millions of the open-water predators are extracted from global seas every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年，總有數以百萬計的公海生物被人類蠶食。

sentences.english: Due to problems with the navigation system, the ship was forced to stop on the high seas.
sentences.chinese: 由於導航系統出現了故障，船舶停駛在公海上了。

sentences.english: Chapter 5: Intervention of Vessel-Source Pollution in High Seas.
sentences.chinese: 第五章對於船舶在公海造成污染的干預問題。

sentences.english: We reached the open sea and the coast receded into the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我們駛抵公海，海岸似乎退到了遠方。

sentences.english: The frigate made for the open sea.
Still, many oil companies see a bright future in oil drilling on the high seas.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，一些石油公司還是在公海海域看到了曙光。
